title: The One About Music Festivals
itunes:author: Sibling Rivalry & Studio71
content:encoded:
Monét just flew back from ACL in Lil' Nas X's first class seat and Bob is worried Monét is losing her voice. Bob explains why he likes attending conferences more than concerts and Monét dishes about hanging out with SZA at baggage claim.

Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
